#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long mulmod(long long a,long long b,long long c){
    long long x = 0,y=a%c;
    while(b){
        if(b%2 == 1){
            x = (x+y);
            if(x>=c)
            	x%=c;
        }
        y = (y*2);
        if(y>=c)
        	y%=c;
        b /= 2;
    }
    return x;
}
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		long long int a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		long long int val=1;
		long long int mod=2*b;
		for(int i=1;i<=a;i++)
		{
			val=mulmod(val,i,mod);
		}
		if(val>=b)
		cout<<"Odd\n";
		else
		cout<<"Even\n";
	}	
}
